## Diagrams with GraphViz

GraphViz supports various diagram types:

```{dot}
digraph G {
  A -> B;
  A -> C;
  B -> D;
  C -> D;
}
```

## Diagrams with Mermaid

Mermaid diagrams for flowcharts, sequences, and more:

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Start] --> B{Decision}
  B -->|Yes| C[Process]
  B -->|No| D[Skip]
  C --> E[End]
  D --> E
```
